routes.title: Pass data from one Stack to another

metadata.title: Deployment configuration file reference
metadata.description: Stacks help you provision and coordinate your infrastructure lifecycle at scale. Learn how to write a deployment configurion to tell HCP Terraform how many times to deploy your Stack's infrastructure.
